here's the mapping:
```
0-500: EF teku
500-1000: EF lighthouse
1000-1500: EF lighthouse 
1500-2000: EF prysm
2000-4000: Prysm
4000-6000: Nimbus
6000-8000: Teku
8000-10000: Lighthouse
10000-12000: Lodestar
12000-13000:Teku beacon + vouch validator
```
